subject: Olympic Games (2016)
Canoes and Canoeing
Water Pollution
lead_paragraph: Canoeists at an Olympic test event in Rio de Janeiro complained about the polluted water at the site but were most outspoken about aquatic plants that tangled their oars and rudders.
snippet: Canoeists at an Olympic test event in Rio de Janeiro complained about the polluted water at the site but were most outspoken about aquatic plants that tangled their oars and rudders.
